description.value: CodeSystem with standard values for the MII data sharing processes

definition.value: Reference with identifier of a MeDIC participating in an approved data sharing project
Identifier of a researcher accessing data of an approved data sharing project
Key to correlate messages from participating MeDICs in an approved data sharing project
Reference with identifier of a COS participating in an approved data sharing project
Identifier of an approved data sharing project
Location as URL where the contract of an approved data sharing project can be found
Max time between request to extract a data-set and delivery of a data-set
Location as URL where the final merged data-set of an approved data sharing project can be accessed by a researcher
Absolute reference to a Binary data-set on a DSF FHIR server, can be encrypted
Reference with identifier of a MeDIC participating in an approved data sharing project
Absolute reference of a DocumentReference on a KDS FHIR server
